name: Fortnite: Chapter 4 - Season 4: Last Resort
storyline: Vampire “kado thorne” has made the island his home in fortnite battle royale chapter 4 season 4, draining the island’s wealth and treasures to fund some pretty fancy real estate: sanguine suites, relentless retreat, and eclipsed estate. heist goods from thorne’s properties to take back what belongs to the island — and more importantly — to thwart thorne’s ultimate plan. the fate of the island is at stake, and thievery’s the last resort. so are you in?
summary:
A season of Fortnite: Chapter 4

The fate of the Island's at stake in Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 4 Season 4, and thievery's the last resort. Are you in?
